title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your mind is running rampant with a deluge of information today, but you might not know what to do with it. Fortunately, the advice you offer to others is likely well received. But perhaps youre uncertain about the validity of your message while irrepressible Mars creates an irritating connection with imaginative Neptune in your sign. Its difficult to hear whats being said over the static, but you dont need to rely on words now. If you share the truth straight from your heart, without worrying about what others think, then you are on the right track. The soul knows how to heal. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
